    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet ImageCategory_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:ImageCategory_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ImageCategory caption="Example String Value" category="2" language="en" removalInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="2345" sort="1234" version="Example String Value">
        <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
        <ImageRef>image_1</ImageRef>
        <URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</URL>
        <Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</Details>
        <MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
            <FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="3456" subTitle="Example String Value">
                <TextParagraph name="paragraph name" number="4567">
                    <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
                    <URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</URL>
                    <ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
                    <DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</DateTimeStamp>
                </TextParagraph>
            </FormattedTextSubSection>
        </MultimediaDescription>
        <DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-01-24">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</DateTimeStamp>
        <Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
            <Address>Example String Value</Address>
            <Type>Business</Type>
            <Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        </Email>
        <Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
        <File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
        <Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"/>
    </Image>
</ImageCategory>

      Example JSON

      {
  "ImageCategory" : {
    "category" : "2",
    "language" : "en",
    "caption" : "Example String Value",
    "removalInd" : true,
    "Image" : [ {
      "@type" : "Image",
      "objID" : "image_1",
      "version" : "Example String Value",
      "format" : "2",
      "dimensionCategory" : "Example String Value",
      "sort" : 1234,
      "resolution" : 2345,
      "colorSpace" : "Example String Value",
      "originalIndicatorInd" : true,
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      },
      "ImageRef" : "image_1",
      "URL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
      "Details" : {
        "value" : "Example String Value",
        "author" : "Example String Value",
        "copyrightNotice" : "Example String Value",
        "copyrightOwner" : "Example String Value",
        "copyrightStart" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
        "copyrightEnd" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
        "effectiveStart" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",
        "effectiveEnd" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
        "applicableStart" : "2011-01-24",
        "applicableEnd" : "2011-07-04"
      },
      "MultimediaDescription" : [ {
        "@type" : "MultimediaDescription",
        "title" : "Example String Value",
        "language" : "en",
        "caption" : "The Empire State Building at sunset.",
        "FormattedTextSubSection" : [ {
          "@type" : "FormattedTextSubSection",
          "subTitle" : "Example String Value",
          "subCode" : "Example String Value",
          "subSectionNumber" : 3456,
          "TextParagraph" : [ {
            "@type" : "TextParagraph",
            "name" : "paragraph name",
            "number" : 4567,
            "Text" : [ {
              "value" : "Formatted text example.",
              "language" : "en",
              "textFormat" : "PlainText"
            } ],
            "Image" : [ ],
            "URL" : [ "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ],
            "ParagraphListItem" : [ {
              "value" : null,
              "listItem" : 1234,
              "text2" : "Formatted text example.",
              "language" : "en",
              "textFormat" : "HTML"
            } ],
            "DateTimeStamp" : {
              "value" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
              "create" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",
              "creatorID" : "c123456789",
              "lastModify" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
              "lastModifierID" : "m987654321",
              "purge" : "2011-12-05"
            }
          } ]
        } ]
      } ],
      "DateTimeStamp" : {
        "value" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
        "create" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",
        "creatorID" : "c123456789",
        "lastModify" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
        "lastModifierID" : "m987654321",
        "purge" : "2011-01-24"
      },
      "Email" : {
        "@type" : "Email",
        "remark" : "Example String Value",
        "textFormat" : "Example String Value",
        "validInd" : true,
        "defaultInd" : true,
        "Address" : "Example String Value",
        "Type" : {
          "value" : "Business"
        },
        "Privacy" : {
          "value" : null,
          "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
          "shareSyncInd" : "No",
          "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
          "optInDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
          "optOutDate" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z"
        }

      "Dimensions" : {
        "value" : null,
        "unitOfMeasureCode" : "2",

      },
      "File" : {
        "value" : null,
        "name" : "Example String Value",
        "size" : 3456,
        "originalName" : "Example String Value"
      },
      "Geolocation" : {
        "value" : null,
        "latitude" : "Example String Value",
        "longitude" : "Example String Value",
        "altitude" : "Example String Value",
        "altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum" : "Miles",
        "mapURL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
        "formatURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
      }
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Image
        A set of images of a given category can be provided in different Format, each format will be described in this element.
        Details
        Type Image
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        category
        Specifies the image category. Refer to OpenTravel Code list Picture Category Code (PIC).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        language
        The language associated with the caption for the category.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:language
        Example Value en
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        caption
        The caption associated to a specific video category which can be provided in different languages.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        removalInd
        If true, this item is obsolete and should be removed from the receiving system.
